field_formula: CASE WHEN PREFETCH_WAITS = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( PREFETCH_WAIT_TIME / PREFETCH_WAIT_TIME ) end
POOL_DATA_L_READS + POOL_INDEX_L_READS + POOL_TEMP_DATA_L_READS + POOL_TEMP_INDEX_L_READS + POOL_TEMP_XDA_L_READS + POOL_XDA_L_READS
POOL_DATA_P_READS + POOL_INDEX_P_READS + POOL_TEMP_DATA_P_READS + POOL_TEMP_INDEX_P_READS + POOL_TEMP_XDA_P_READS + POOL_XDA_P_READS
